scripts.development: COSMIC_BUCKET=tonyspiro PORT=5000 NODE_ENV=development nodemon app.js -e js,html
scripts.concat-js: rm -f public/assets/js/combined.js; concat-cli -f public/assets/js/jquery.min.js public/assets/js/skel.min.js public/assets/js/util.js public/assets/js/main.js public/assets/js/prism.js public/assets/js/shorti-browser.js -o public/assets/js/combined.js
